```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
devtools::load_all("..")
```

```{r options, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
simrOptions(nSim=50, progress=FALSE)
```


```{r}
model1 <- glmer(z ~ x + (1|g), family="poisson", data=example)
print(model1)
```


```{r}
ps <- powerSim(model1, nSim=15)
```


```{r}
pc <- powerCurve(model1, nSim=15)
```
